## ORGANIZATION\_LIST variable

ORGANIZATION\_LIST

Query to take the Organization list

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ORGANIZATION_LIST: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Example

Here is the program structure of the query:

```
export const ORGANIZATION_LIST = gql`
  query {
    organizations {
      _id
      image
      creator {
        firstName
        lastName
      }
      name
      members {
        _id
      }
      admins {
        _id
      }
      createdAt
      location
    }
  }
`;
```
